MsWelcon: Welcome to the repository of software projects!
MsDescription: Find the training projects created by the apprentices of Sena. If you are a student, a company or a private individual, can access the software documentation developed by Sena apprentices.
MensajeCard1: Publish your training project and allow Sena, companies and apprentices to visualize your idea. Link with a company and access the monitoring of the implementation of the project.
MensajeCard2: Contribute to the training of future sena apprentices by allowing other users to access the documentation and code of your project.
MensajeCard3: Download the documentation and source code of the training projects. And use it according to the licenses granted by the apprentices.
Name: Name
MessageAccount: Do you already have an account?
licenseText: When your code is free software, you provide the freedom that any user can run your system or program, for any purpose, it can also be studied and improved in some aspects to make it more functional and effective; thus benefiting the apprenticeship community.
